author: Yannick Miseriaux
description: OK, so there's no crust, but this does contain egg yolk, caramel, vanilla, sugar and cream. Due to the cinnamon, it even has a brown top.
name: Crème Brûlée Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Licor 43 (or other spiced vanilla liqueur)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass
